What is Java?,"Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems in 1995."
Who developed Java?,Java was developed by James Gosling at Sun Microsystems (now Oracle).
What is JVM?,JVM (Java Virtual Machine) runs Java bytecode on different platforms.
What is JDK and JRE?,JDK = Java Development Kit (compiler + tools). JRE = Java Runtime Environment (JVM + libraries).
How Java code compiles and runs?,javac compiles .java to .class (bytecode). java command runs the bytecode on the JVM.
